Containers.Name: Tmux Terminal Manager (TTM)
Containers.Description: Leave terminals and come back later. Manage and create persistent terminal sessions in the Unraid Web GUI. (Installs Tmux and Reptyr - if not already installed)
Containers.Changes: ###2024.12.26 - release note: welcome to the first version of the plugin - release note: please report any issues in the support thread on the forums
